name: Save Telegram messages to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new message is posted to a specified Telegram chat/channel, Make will automatically add that message to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dOjxfEroPDXQLJTw2u3XufqifxyoMpAmYNwwoklrVt0/edit?usp=sharing).
